title: 820-2915 Starts to boot then screen goes blank.
message: So I have an 820-2915 that attempts to boot but when the bar gets to like 80% the screen goes blank, like just the apple logo and bar disappear. Every once in like 20 tries will it actually boot.

title: 820-2915 Starts to boot then screen goes blank.
message: I think I know the answer. I found an older forum post that said the GPU is dying... My question is, is the GPU the last thing that gets initialized by the BIOS?

title: 820-2915 Starts to boot then screen goes blank.
message:
Active graphics is configured into NVRAM, in BIOS chip.
Nowadays impossible to find real new chip for that.
You should consider disabling discrete GPU and use only iGPU.
There are few ways to do that...
